text: Schlagintweit is a surname. Notable persons with that surname include: * A German family of 5 brothers, all explorers and scholars: **Hermann Schlagintweit (1826–1882), German explorer of Central Asia **Adolf Schlagintweit (1829–1857) **Eduard Schlagintweit (1831–1866) **Robert Schlagintweit (1833–1885) **Emil Schlagintweit (1835–1904)
title: Schlagintweit
